1442110.name: Red Cap Zombie Hunter Demo
1442110.description:
Play 1st level of Red Cap Zombie Hunter. Full game will have 33 levels increasing fun and difficulty.

For demo version you only can achive BRONZE IV Honor. This is that you can only improve your character with 12 skills level up.

In the full game if you get GOLD IV you'll have til 48 improves of your character skills.
1442110.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
